member.name: IMFSensorProfileCollection.AddProfile
member.summary: Adds the specified profile to the collection.
member.param: Pointer to an object describing the profile to add.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSensorProfileCollection.FindProfile
member.summary: Finds a profile based on the specified profile ID.
member.param: Pointer to the The ID of the profile to find.
On success, returns a double pointer to the profile.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSensorProfileCollection.GetProfile
member.param: Index of the profile to retrieve.
On success, returns a double pointer to an object that describes the specified sensor profile.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSensorProfileCollection.RemoveProfile
member.summary: removes the specified profile based on the specified profile ID.
member.param: Pointer to the of the profile to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSensorProfileCollection.RemoveProfileByIndex

summary.code: Removes a profile based on the specified index.

member.param: The index of the profile to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSensorProfileCollection
member.summary: Contains a collection of media foundation sensor profile objects.
